posts.title: Amazon Product Description
posts.description: A proof of concept, Amazon product description generator using GPT-Neo for Texta.ai

posts.title: Anime RecSys
posts.description: Development and comparison of user-item recommendation systems in TensorFlow on an anime dataset.

posts.title: Bayes Feed
posts.description: An RSS feed with a Naive Bayes recommender that is learning online.

posts.title: Data Science Bootcamp Yandex Practicum
posts.description: Collection of final projects from data science bootcamp from Yandex Practicum.

posts.title: Felony Felines
posts.description: Felony Felines is a local multiplayer top-down wave-based survival shooter in which 2 players fight an endless army of robots in the spirit of Box Head 2-Play

posts.title: Inversive Geometry
posts.description: React.js app that visually demonstrates the inversive geometry transformation of a point in a circle on a given image.

posts.title: Kamernet Puppeteer
posts.description: Automatic message sender to new adverts on Kamernet using puppeteer.

posts.title: LaTeXGen
posts.description: Webapp that allows creation of self-generating mathematical problems in LaTeX and markdown languages using JavaScript.

posts.title: Markov Chain Text Generator
posts.description: Text generator written in React.js that uses Markov chains to generate text based on a given input.

posts.description: The chemical and physical properties of a molecule are determined not only by its structural formula, but also by its conformation â€“ positions of atoms in 3d space.

posts.title: Orama Visual Assistant
posts.description: Orama Visual Assistant is an app for visually impaired people that announces objects detected using user's phone camera.

posts.title: Pipe Thickness Calculator
posts.description: Application for calculating pipe thickness based on material properties and exporting calculations into a word document.

posts.title: Potato Cashback
posts.description: Accessible loyalty program for stores using just a phone app. Apart from rise of number and average of receipts and analytics, a database of clients is collected, to whom polls and news can sent and special offers can be made.

posts.title: Soft Skills AI
posts.description: Telegram bot that simulates work situations to help HR select people for support. It generates text scenarios using GPT-3 from OpenAI.
